message.body: Would you like us to come down for your neurology appointment on the 14th?
Okay just wondering when we can come down and visit?
After that? May I don't know why you would spend money to come here
There's always lots of things going on in Philly and just want to see you
Come whenever you want. I just will not need more stress when I go to the movement disorder specialist so I would like to go alone.
I understand you wanting to go alone.didn't mean to stress you out more by asking to go,sorry,love mom
It will just be easer if I just have that to focus on.
Have you heard of rosas pizza 11th and chestnut.you buy a slice and for another dollar you can feed a homeless person w/a slice
